title: Low Priority queue for no reason

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Guys Fix this i just got in Low priority queue for no reason look in the last match i lost my connection and i closed it after that when i got my connection back it shows i am in low Priority queue pls help me what can i do if i lost my connection ????? :(

replies.body:
It looks like this [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) resulted from a game left as Wukong.  It sucks that this happened a result of a connection issue.  :(  The system is going to treat everyone equally regardless of intent, though, because all leaves still cause others a bad experience. 

I highly recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help prevent this from happening in the future.  Let me know if you have any questions.
